title: [Health] Study: School days should begin later in morning. School closures had a negative effect on the health and well-being of many young people, but homeschooling also had a positive flipside: Thanks to sleeping longer in the morning, teenagers reported improved health and health-related quality of life.

[Health] Early morning school or work start times render sufficient sleep challenging because they are often misaligned with sleep biology. A new study shows that a majority of teachers too prefer later school start times with a preferred shift of about half an hour.
